text: Dr. James A. Gosling (born May 19, 1955) is a Canadian computer scientist who invented Java. Gosling was born on May 19, 1955 in Calgary, Alberta, Canada. He studied at the University of Calgary and at Carnegie Mellon University. Gosling is married. They have two children. ==References== ==Other websites== *James Gosling's personal weblog *Presentation by James Gosling about the origins of Java, from the JVM Languages Summit 2008 *slide show depicting Gosling's life Category:1955 births Category:Living people Category:Canadian computer scientists Category:Canadian chief executives Category:People from Calgary Category:University of Calgary alumni
title: James Gosling
